case_title: Messrs GULBERG KABANA (PVT.) LTD., LAHORE vs COLLECTOR SALES TAX, LAHORE and another
respondent: COLLECTOR SALES TAX, LAHORE and another

facts.allegation: Evaded sales tax amounting to Rs.509,053

legal_issues.time_limit_violation: Order passed beyond prescribed 45 days and extended 90 days limit

judgment.reasoning: Failure to adhere to statutory time limits under sections 11(4) and 36(3) of the Sales Tax Act, 1990
judgment.legal_point_precedence: Appeal decided solely on legal issue of limitation
